column1:
,TRUE,4,5,3,4,4 macordani","2021-06-10T16:58:10.117Z","A welcome addition to the minifig collection","

Many younger Marvel fans out there likely have no idea who Giant Man is, however the "
column3: on the package should give it away.&nbsp
column4: Hank Pym is better known as Michael Douglas in todays Ant Man movies blockbuster hits.&nbsp
column5: He is known to have created the Pym particle, along with the Ant Man suit which allows the individual to shrink or even grow.&nbsp
column6: So Hank historically went under many different names in the past, Ant Man, Giant Man, Goliath.

column1: Looking at the minifig now it is the usual high quality we expect from Lego.
column2: What I especially like about the minifig are the bright colors and how true they are to the comic version of Giant Man.&nbsp
column3: The blue and yellow outfit go together especially well with the bright gold visor he wears.&nbsp
column4: Details are even seen across the waist that we see in the comic version.&nbsp
column5: However a bit of a let down is that there is no printing on the legs.&nbsp
column6: Being a polybag limited release figure you would hope for more, like maybe some yellow added boots, or the groin part of the legs being yellow vs blue.&nbsp
column7: This would have made the figure much more true to the comics version.

column1: To end with, even though Giant Man isn'
column2: t well known in todays Marvel universe, Hank Pym was a founder of the original Avengers, so in my mind any minifig of him is a welcome addition.
